settings.title: The Original Crockpet Diet eBook
settings.text: Learn more about the history and science behind The Original Crockpet Diet, the foods that go into it, and how you can optimize each back for your pet's best health.

settings.title: Downloadable Files
settings.text: Download & access the recipes via your phone, tablet, or computer. You'll get immediate online access to the TOCPD recipes, and their many variations, including Keto versions, Dr. Ruth's recipe for pets with kidney disease, holiday recipes, and more!
